usage.quote:
First one
will be always first
usage.description: Increase your productivity by organizing your tasks in the most natural way - by queueing them. Stop procrastinating and let the app engage you to do tasks without the possibility to change their order.
usage.manual: Just press "Push a task" button an basically create an empty task. Fill a title and expand it to provide more data in a description field. Already finished the task? Just click the "Pop the first task" button above the queue and remove the first task.

about.motto: Manage your everyday tasks the right way.
about.browser_error: Unable to open a web browser.
